title: Strong Nose
data:
{| cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" border="1" |- style="font-style:italic;" |Rank||Effect||Flavor |- |1||Detect items nearby.||Your uncanny sense of smell can sniff out nearby items. |- | colspan="3" | '''Species:''' [[Gnoll]]s start out with this mutation.
[[Jiyva]]'s [[Jelly Sensing Items]] mutation is similar, but limited to a range of 6 tiles. |- style="font-style:italic;" | colspan="3" | [[Mutation]] |} [[Category:Mutations]] [[Category:Intrinsic]]
